snippet: Though some games, like Tomb Raider, offer heroines, some gamers are personally filling a gap by creating strong female characters of their own.
abstract: Gamers, lamenting paucity of strong female roles in favorite video games are personally filling gap by creating strong characters of their own; through hacks and campaigns to get industry's attention, women's role in video games is gaining attention and importance.
lead_paragraph: Though some games, like Tomb Raider, offer heroines, some gamers are personally filling a gap by creating strong female characters of their own.

headline.seo: Chris Suellentrop on the Year in Video Games
headline.main: In the Footsteps of Lara Croft
headline.print_headline: In the Footsteps of Lara Croft
